title: Manager Special, 1x1 Apartment with AC and Easy Access to BART!
posting_body: ['Clayton Gardens', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x137', '1 \xa0bedroom 1 bath 600Sq.', 'Ft.  $2,314 - $2,567/mo', '* Unit 220 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 214 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 108 - Available', 'Now', 'Live with beauty and serenity', 'Staying active is now possible in the fitness center of this one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment being offered at Clayton Gardens.', 'You’ll immediately notice the open floor layout that can give you a welcoming feel.', 'A separate dining area is provided to make your meals more enjoyable.', 'Cleanup is easier, thanks to the installed dishwasher.', 'Maintaining the orderliness of your home is more manageable through the use of the oversized closets.', 'With air conditioning and ceiling fans, staying indoors during the summer is comfortable.', 'Finally, the home is outfitted with a patio, which provides an ideal place for rest and relaxation.', 'You can have a fun time with friends in the community clubhouse.', 'Likewise, your four-legged pals are welcome here.', 'With these numerous features, it’ll be simple for you to pick up the phone and call today.', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES:', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* ClubHouse', '* Carports', '* Cable', '* Air conditioning - central air', '* Laundry', '* Controlled building access', 'MANAGED BY:', 'GK MANAGEMENT CO INC**', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x137', 'Address:', '4220 Clayton Rd Concord, CA 94521', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Get $1000 off your first month rent when you lease with in 48 hours of your tour at Clayton Gardens.']
